__e: A bad mistake, 86-- and your last.
VERY MUCH A WOMAN, AND VERY MUCH AWARE OF THE FACT.
But lack of money is not fatal, and things might work out.
She says she's trained me now in her illnesses and if I leave her to join up, it'd be fatal.
If I'm here when he comes to, and he sees me, after all that's happened... it could be fatal to him.
He said if I told anybody it could prove fatal for them as well as for me.
I wonder why an intelligent young man like yourself should make such a foolish, fatal mistake, of coming here to challenge me.
I always felt there was a fatal element of hunger in your last affair.
And when you walked away, he made the fatal mistake of drinking it himself.
There is a fatal weakness in me that made me suffer greatly.
Mine is fatal in exactly 30 seconds.
